page.title: 16Fund Raising in Niton
page.content: Saturday is the traditional day for fund raising in the village.Niton Parish Church has taken the oppor- tunity to hold a "Bygone Days"Exhib- ition.The Horticultural Society have an annual Plant Sale,The Bellringers had a "Mens Only Craft Competition" and the Village Hall Committee have numerous Jumble Sales and Coffee Mornings as well as an annual Village Concert to help raise funds to improve the hall facilities.Scouts,Cubs,Guides and Brownies have performed concerts, pantomimes,and"Gang Shows".For a week each year the Art Class exhibit members'work.The Village is always ready to support events held on behalf of the Third World needy,and during 1985 numerous events have raised over Â£2000.Christmas will bring the annual Christian Celebration,truly a community effort,enjoyed by all.
